entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins, standing behind George. He wolf-whistles at Bill and Charlie.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins, standing behind Fred.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as looking rather pink and reacting to the music with excitement.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's ears are mentioned as still being scarlet, indicating his embarrassment or reaction to something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as responding noncommittally to Fred's comment about the music.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as strolling up the aisle with his wife, smiling and waving at relatives.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as wearing a brand-new set of amethyst-colored robes with a matching hat.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as standing up at the front of the marquee, wearing dress robes and a large white rose in his buttonhole.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned as standing up at the front of the marquee, wearing dress robes and a large white rose in his buttonhole.

relationships.description: Fred and George are mentioned as the Weasley twins, standing behind each other.
Hermione is mentioned as reacting to the music with excitement, swivelling around in her seat to look at the entrance.
Ron's ears are mentioned as still being scarlet, indicating his embarrassment or reaction to something.
Harry is mentioned as responding noncommittally to Fred's comment about the music.
Mr. and Mrs. Weasley are mentioned as strolling up the aisle together, smiling and waving at relatives.
Bill and Charlie are mentioned as standing up at the front of the marquee, wearing dress robes and large white roses in their buttonholes.
